Description:
PN/D0/WIAGL/171121/01 - 312041115
Persons are exposed to the risk of falling into the water and that the said matters involve contravention of the following statutory provisions because in the course of construction work where persons are at risk of falling into water with a risk of drowning, you have failed to take suitable and sufficient steps to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, persons falling (e.g. lack of suitable edge protection or other measures to prevent a fall).
